name: SushiParty
description: A simple but actionable shooter! In recent years, "shrimp" and "tuna" were fighting. However, tuna adopted all sushi and enjoys the rule of the galaxy. The shrimp will defeat the tuna to save the galaxy! Sushi will save the galaxy!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsVista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
